summary: An overhaul of the Solitude and surrounding area for Skyrim. New crafting stations, clutter and NPCs inside the city, extended docks and a brand new farm outside.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]The Roland theme for Solitude Overhaul is an overhaul of the city of Solitude and surrounding area for Skyrim. New crafting stations, clutter and NPCs inside the city, extended docks and a brand new farm outside. 

Named after the Frankish knight Roland, in medieval literature; a nice regal sounding name. [i]I hope you have fun[/i].

Cleaned with TES5Edit.

It Will Conflict with other mods that add to or replace elements of Solitude.[/size]

[youtube]MdsrsGym1-0[/youtube]

[size=3][b]Recommended Mods (but NOT Required)[/b]
Immersive Laundry by Nerd of Prey
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58084/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58084/[/url]
 
Sexy Solitutde v1 by horrorview
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12308]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12308[/url]

Imaginator by MyGoodEye and Gopher - with help from Vivanto and Deapri
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049[/url]

Populated Cities by Pandazooka
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9201]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9201[/url]

Hoodless Dragon Priest Masks by insaneguy99
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16669/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16669/


[/url][/size][b][size=3]Changes Added:

Solitude[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Added 7 new merchants
[*]Added new clutter such as crates, boxes and things
[*]Added tableaus - small scenes of food on a table, mead bottles and chairs, maps
[*]Added Dwemer architecture elemnts to Castle District
[*]Added Glowing Magic Rock lights - blackreach crystals with light object and glow effect
[*]Deleted and re-positioned some flowers
[*]Added new smelter with existing assets
[*]Added 2 new fountains with audio effects
[*]Added 2 ridable horses - the one at the stable is randomly generated
[*]Added Elite Guards - the guards with the mask guarding Castle Dour, some buildings
[*]Added platoon of Elite Guards in formation in castle district
[*]Added many crafting stations
[*]Changed executioners block to a theater complete with chairs and drapery
[*]Added many hidden Mara statues
[*]Added other small details such as skooma bottles, random crates, merchant's wares & many more
[/list]
[b][size=3]Solitude Docks[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Extended the Docks section with added wharfs
[*]Added some big ships, small ships
[*]Added clutter such as crates, lobster traps, barrels & sacks
[*]Added new new nameless NPCs to flesh out the docks
[*]Changed Vitoria Vici's into a bar complete with stools
[*]Replaced Solitude banners for Mythic Dawn banners
[*]Added lights and light poles
[*]Added many crafting stations
[*]Added idle markers for NPCs
[*]Custom little details for each ship e.g. skooma bottles, cabbages, weapons
[*]Added Mysterious Sacks
[*]Added an entrance in front of docks
[*]Changed the name of Map Marker
[*]Added navmesh for NPCs and player followers
[*]Added small details such as fishing poles, tapestry on some boats and many more
[/list]
[b][size=3]City Farms[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Added 90 cabbages, 72 potatoes, 33 leeks to be picked
[*]Added many crafting stations
[*]Added new PCs, some with custom AI packages
[*]Added idle markers for NPCs
[*]Added a couple of Solitude guards
[*]Added a trench
[*]Added a new map marker, can't fast travel to
[*]Removed ancient stones clutter from existing area
[*]Added and changed landmass
[*]Added 2 houses, with lights
[*]Added small details such as tables, fishing poles, fences and barrels
[*]Removed some creature spawns
[/list]
author: Luigi Pangaro
